question: How do you manage priorities at work?
solution:
```markdown
This was a very general one. I tried to answer with more details possible and a lot of reference to my daily work:
- set priorities doing team agile session
- align with business needs
- align with colleagues and manager
- first small quick task 
- brake down larger task/projects
- of course balance deadlines
- continues feedback from manager and company OKRs
```
